text: Vlad would risk anything, even eternal servitute under an unjust tyrant, in order to bring back his beloved Isabella.
Before his latest untimely demise, Vlad Von Carstein's most prized goal was the very throne of the Empire of Man. Now, it's time to collect it once more.

Five hundred years ago, Vlad's reign of terror met an untimely hand due to the intervention of the previous Grand Theogonist. Though different in name and body, their role is shared - it's time to take out Volkmar the so-called Grim.
[PH] - Arkhan shall not suffer anyone to challenge the Great Necromancer, not even the king of Khemri
[PH] - Arkhan prides himself in being Nagash's most faithful servant, and knows his dedication will be well rewarded in time.
[PH] - Neferata was the first to receive the gift of undeath. She intends to be the last.
[PH] - From atop her lair, the Queen of Mysteries overseers the intricate web of agents she has spung across the world.
[PH] - Lahmia is Neferata's birth right, and has been wrestled from her fair hands for too long. This shall not stand any longer.
For all their pledges, Mortarchs may need unfailingly loyal eyes watching over them...
And it is not just the Legion who is doomed.
Undead troops hardly cheer when their leader is the first in the melee, but somehow it all counts.
An armoured gauntlet pointed at everything living, and unliving under the wrong banners.

So much to do, so many minds, so many directions.
You may need special powers, and possibly an anchor and lengths of rope, to gather what Luthor can reliably do best, but you'll know it once you're there.
